meanings.definition: Present or bring (something) into use or operation for the first time.
meanings.sent1: She introduced a new game to her friends.
meanings.sent2: The teacher introduced a fun activity to the class.
meanings.sent3: He introduced a silly dance move during the party.
meanings.sent4: The chef introduced a burst of flavor to the dish.
meanings.sent5: The magician introduced a rabbit from his hat.

meanings.definition: Make (someone) known by name to another in person or formally.
meanings.sent1: She introduced her best friend to her parents.
meanings.sent2: The host introduced the guest speaker at the event.
meanings.sent3: He introduced his pet parrot to the new puppy.
meanings.sent4: The detective introduced the suspect to the witness.
meanings.sent5: The teacher introduced the class to a famous scientist.

meanings.definition: Bring (something, especially a product, measure, or concept) into use or operation for the first time.
meanings.sent1: The company introduced a new line of smartphones.
meanings.sent2: The government introduced a new policy to improve healthcare.
meanings.sent3: He introduced a unique twist to the traditional recipe.
meanings.sent4: The artist introduced a fresh perspective to the art world.
meanings.sent5: The inventor introduced a groundbreaking invention to the market.
